questions.question_text: What term is used to describe a burner flame that moves back through the burner nozzle?

options.A: ______________ use a mechanical device to mix the required amounts of air and gas before ignition = Premix burners
options.B: The ________________ uses air under pressure to entrain gas at atmospheric pressure = Aspirator type of burner
options.C: The ________________ provides complete premixing with mechanical mixers = Blower-mix burner
